HLT.Description: Tasks focused on health and well-being, including daily exercise routines, balanced nutrition planning, and mental wellness practices.

LNG.Description: Language-learning activities aimed at mastering grammar, expanding vocabulary, practicing conversation, and daily language exercises.

PRJ.Description: Project-related work, involving time dedicated to ongoing projects, development tasks, and completing project milestones.

ART.Description: Creative and artistic tasks, such as drawing, sculpting, making music, or engaging in other artistic disciplines.

DEV.Description: Development-focused tasks, including coding practice, learning new technologies, and exploring software engineering concepts.

EDU.Description: Educational tasks, covering study in diverse subjects, reading academic material, and self-directed learning.

SKL.Description: Skill-building activities, such as learning new practical skills, training with instruments, or practicing through hands-on tutorials.

ENT.Description: Entertainment and leisure activities, like playing games, watching movies, or engaging in relaxation and rest.

TODO.Description: General task planning and organization activities, setting goals, reviewing plans, and scheduling upcoming tasks.
